quest.name: Quality Parts, Guaranteed
journal:
Regitt has a twinkle in his eye and a request on his lips.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Shigitt has tasked you with crafting four core components, then delivering the completed items to Regitt.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Our Rolling Tankards will be the culmination of much careful planning and applied theory, which is why I want to entrust the most vital elements to a master artisan of proven quality. ...Aye, that would be you!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: There's much to be done, but Shigitt can give you the details─and the resources─you need to proceed. We're counting on you, Forename!

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Ready to make some core components for the Tankard, then? Glad to have you aboard.

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Right, so what I need from you is four tempered nozzles, highly resistant to heat─they'll be used in the fuel injection device for emergency escapes, so we'll want to be sure they work. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Right, so what I need from you is four padded cushions for the tank's interior─we need to make sure the automaton inside is properly protected from impacts. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Right, so what I need from you is four durable tracks of rubber for the wheels─when the going gets rough, we'll want the tank to keep rolling. Start with these ingredients, and let me know if you need more.

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Once you're satisfied, take what you've made straight to Regitt, and he'll pass it on to the tank engineers. They're eager to put everything together!

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.

dialogue.name: SHIGITT
dialogue.text: Out of ingredients already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Forename! What have you brought me!?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Now this is some fine work...very fine indeed! With parts of this quality, our tanks will perform even better than Watts could've imagined! Lali-ho-ho-ho, I am moved to tears! Flabbergasted! Duly impressed!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: ...Uh, not that I'm trying to flatter you so you'll accept an even more difficult task next time or anything like that! I just...know how to appreciate true artisanship! Yes!
